'''--- README.md ---
# AssemblyScriptContract
Smartcontract development using assembly script and rust

'''
'''--- asconfig.json ---
{
	"extends": "near-sdk-as/asconfig.json"
}

'''
'''--- assembly/index.ts ---
import { Context, storage } from "near-sdk-as";

export class Greeting {
    getGreeting (accountId: string): string | null
    {
        return storage.get<string>(accountId, "Greeting not available");
    }

    setGreeting (greeting:string): void
    {
        storage.set(Context.sender, greeting);
    }

}
'''
'''--- package.json ---
{
  "name": "assemblyscriptcontract",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Smart contract with assemblyscript and rust",
  "main": "index.js",

    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },

  }
}
